name: Light of a feather
description:
Made for the GameDev.tv 2022 GameJam - Death is only the beginning.

RECOMMENDED: MOUSE & KEYBOARD

Step into ancient Egyptian mythology with this short game. You are on a journey through the realm of the dead to try and reach the field of reeds in the afterlife. Only the heart as light as a feather will achieve immortality? Find and collect all the scarab amulets to hide the sins that weigh heavy on your own heart! Will you succeed, or will the monsters get you first?

HOW TO PLAY

Search each labyrinth searching for the 5 scarabs amulets to unlock the exit.

Use your sceptre to ward off the enemies of the same colour as your magic

CONTROLS

Move using the Keyboard Arrow keys.

Target moving the Mouse around

LMB - Shoot magic

RMB - Change magic
